CHAT.comment: MOT and Chi work moderately well together , although they are more antagonistic with each other than helpful. Still , a friendly atmosphere remained throughout the activity. A few short segments of activity and talk surround the idea of repulsion , though the word <repulsion , or repel> is never used. The experimenter remains in the distance , only commenting and laughing occasionally. MOT talks to another sibling. Video does not start until later; transcription until then is solely from audio

u.a: MOT talks to another sibling who is going somewhere; Chi asks if he can go too; EXP talks about the activity
video starts here

Chi sits at a large table; several objects are visible: the white plastic sheep , plastic turtle , plastic orange man , red magnetic ball , black base magnet , and yellow magnetic wand; Mot isn't visible on video; Chi holds the yellow wand over the orange ball , which sits on the black base , and quickly pulls away the yellow wand , taking the orange ball with it; apparently , the orange ball then flies off the yellow wand
picks up the turtle with the yellow wand
the turtle is plastic , but with a magnetic piece inserted underneath its shell , it can be picked up with the wand
bends down to find the orange ball with the help of the yellow wand
bends down , looking under the table
MOT is visible on the video now; she sits with the black base magnet in front of her and she picks up the other pieces which are around on the table
picks up the turtle with the yellow wand
shakes the wand , showing that the turtle doesn't come off easily
faint
turtle sits on the table and Chi holds the wand nearby , trying to get the turtle to move towards the wand; it doesn't work
picks up turtle to take a closer look at it
takes the orange ball from the black base with which Mot was playing
the orange ball is on the table , as is the yellow wand; Chi moves the yellow wand back and forth on the table
holds the yellow wand above the orange ball; the red ball jumps from the table onto the yellow wand
MOT and Chi are not playing together; each one talks about their own particular situation

g.ga: yellow ball with star which is on black base

u.a: on the black base , there is a star and a triangle; Mot has placed the yellow ball on the star and the ball remains on the star
Chi wants Mot to watch the orange ball jump onto the yellow wand
demonstrates this phenomena twice
takes the orange ball
MOT doesn't speak clearly
drops the orange ball on top of the yellow ball; the orange ball rolls off the top of the yellow ball and off the star
drops the orange ball on top of the yellow ball again; this time , the yellow ball moves out from under the orange ball and off the star
with one ball in each hand , MOT puts the balls together; when Mot lets go , the balls roll away from each other
demonstrates the repulsion again
takes the yellow ball from Mot with the yellow wand
takes the triangle from the black base

puts the yellow ball on the table in between the triangle magnet and the yellow wand; when Chi moves the triangle closer to the yellow ball , it is repelled and moves closer to the wand and then attaches to the wand
rotates the flat silver circle on top of the black base and on top of which sit the star and the orange ball
during most of the pause , Chi continues experimenting with the repulstion and attraction of the triangle , wand , and yellow ball; then he goes back to making the ball jump onto the wand
holds yellow wand about two inches above the yellow ball
picks up the orange ball with the triangle
moves the wand close to the orange ball which Mot holds with the triangle
touches the yellow wand to the black base; it's not clear if Chi meant to have the wand and base stick together , but they do briefly
removes the wand quickly from the black base
MOT and Chi push against each other's magnets in what looks like a mini sword fight; Mot uses the triangle and Chi uses the wand
as Mot and Chi push with their pieces above the black base , the orange ball on the black base wiggles
takes the orange ball off the base
puts the yellow ball on the base
takes the yellow ball off the base
takes the orange ball from table where it has rolled away from Mot

MOT has prepared something on the black base; it's not easily visible on video; she holds the orange ball above the base using the magnetic triangle; Chi holds the yellow wand , under which the turtle is suspended , above the base and below Mot's triangle and orange ball
touches the triangle to the orange ball and lifts them both up
drops turtle onto the black base
takes the yellow ball from the black base with the yellow wand
puts the orange ball and triangle onto the black base and starts surronding it with other pieces
puts the yellow ball , which hangs from the yellow wand , on the black base as he tries to remove other pieces
takes the yellow ball and protects it and other pieces with her hands
holds the wand close to the black base
it's unclear what Chi is daring Mot to do , perhaps he is daring her to take away her hands
tries to take a piece from the black base with the yellow wand , maybe one of the balls , but does not succeed
makes another attempt to take a piece from Mot; this time , he succeeds and takes away the yellow and orange balls
grabs back the yellow ball

g.ga: yellow wand with orange ball attached

u.a: holds out the yellow wand close to Mot
picks up the yellow ball with the triangle and holds them up
gets out of chair to try to get the yellow ball from Mot
reaches out with yellow wand towards the yellow ball in Mot's hand
gets the yellow and orange balls
tries to take away pieces on the black base with the wand but ends up losing both the orange and yellow balls instead
picks up the box of pieces
the silver metal pieces have not been a part of play until now
stands the turtle and the orange man on the edge of the black base
touches the black base with the yellow wand
drops several silver metal objects onto the the black base
puts the wand on the pile of objects
MOT doesn't want Chi to use the yellow wand
tries to pick up a silver man with a silver stick attached at the end of the yellow wand

g.ga: getting silver man off black base with silver stick

u.a: removes a silver man from the black base and sets it on the table
silver man
Chi holds the yellow wand; a silver man lies on the wand and Chi lifts the silver man up with a silver stick; it looks like the silver man is doing a hand stand on the yellow wand

g.ga: lift silver man with silver stick

u.a: aft lifts the silver man completely off the wand with the silver stick; the silver man dangles briefly from the silver stick and then falls onto the table

g.ga: pick up silver man with silver stick

u.a: <$=5> it refers to picking up the silver man with a silver stick
MOT
MOT's silver man dangles from her silver stick
knocks the silver man off Mot's stick with his silver stick and then picks it up with the yellow wand
a silver man dangles briefly from Mot's silver stick and then falls to the table
a silver stick is attached to the end of the yellow wand; a silver man dangles from the end of the silver stick
removes the silver stick , from which dangles a silver man , from the yellow wand
the silver man remains dangling from the silver stick briefly and then falls
indicates objects on the black base
picks up a nut from the black base with a silver stick; it falls off
removes objects from the black base with the yellow wand
taps at a silver man on the black base with a silver stick
funny deep voice
MOT and Chi are trying to get the same silver man which is on the black base
tries to get the silver man off of the black base with the yellow wand
touches the yellow wand to a penny which is on the table
picks up the washer and the nut with the yellow wand
holds out the silver stick as if it were a sword
knocks of pieces from the yellow wand , which Chi holds , using the silver stick , her sword
stabs at the white sheep with the silver stick
using the silver stick , MOT moves pieces on the black base where Chi is playing
MOT
Chi wants Mot to stop playing with the pieces on the black base
MOT uses the silver stick to move objects on the black base; Chi uses a silver stick and the yellow wand; Mot and Chi work against each other
tries to pick up a silver man on the black base with the yellow wand
covers the black base with her hands
picks up a silver man with the yellow wand from the side of the black base
sets ball down on table
takes the ball which Mot was using
the silver man dangles from Mot's silver stick for a short while and then falls off
picks up the fallen silver man with the yellow wand
dangles another silver man in the air using the silver stick; the silver man stays briefly and then falls
reaches across table to pick up another silver man with the wand
reaches out to take a silver man from Mot , who is playing with the silver man on the black base
pokes Chi with the silver stick
MOT picks up two silver men with the silver stick; while they dangle in the air , Chi quickly swipes them with the yellow wand; Chi only gets one man , however , the other one flying away
sets a silver man on the wand in an upright position
looks around the table for the silver man which went flying
tries to pick up objects from the black base
Chi is trying to stand up the silver men on the yellow wand; he has gotten one to stand , but the second one fell down
holds each end of a silver stick with the thumb and forefinger of each hand
puts yellow wand down on the middle of the silver stick and moves the wand as if he were sawing
lifts the yellow wand up high over his head as if to prepare to break the silver stick which Mot holds
sarcasm
brings arm down naturally; does not strike the silver stick
picks up a nut and tosses in onto the black base
picks up a silver stick and tosses it onto the black base
tries to stand the silver man on top of another silver man which lies flat on the yellow wand; it seems that the silver man won't stand or won't stick
rubs the silver man on the underside of the yellow wand
holds up the yellow wand with a silver man standing on top of the yellow wand and a silver man attached on his side to the bottom of the yellow wand
tries to pick up the silver men from the table to put them on the black base; she has difficulty because they are flat on the table
rubs a silver man on the underside of the yellow wand
knocks of the top silver man from the yellow wand with a silver stick
grabs some silver men from the black base
covers the base with her hands
picks up objects from the black base with the yellow wand
removes objects (washers , silver men , etc .) from the yellow wand by sliding the yellow wand against the black base
places silver sticks and other metal objects on the table in front of Chi
Chi balances the black base , with lots_of objects on top of it , on the yellow wand

g.ga: balancing black base on yellow wand

u.a: while still balancing the black base on the yellow wand , Chi picks up the silver sticks and other objects which were placed on the table by Mot
grabs the black base
pulls back so that Mot can't hold onto the base
grabs the black base
pulls back again; pieces fall to the floor
videotape ends
